page.title: 02HOUSES
page.content:
There are fifty-four houses in Saxton that are older than four years. A house is what we live in and it is a sort of shelter from the rain and the wind.In the houses there is furniture and in all houses a television. Upstairs there are some beds.
Some people have a garden and grow their own vegetables. In some houses there are some pets like a dog.
A house is usually made of stone or brick. Some times you can find a house made of wood. We have four wooden Swedish houses in Saxton. In a house you will find some glass windows to look out of. In the house there is a fire so in winter it will keep people warm.
